text: @realDonaldTrump Obama administration left a 69 Page Pandemic Playbook for Trump. Page 9 of the book specifically mentioned coronavirus. Obama also set up a Pandemic Team in the White House to stay on top of pandemic across the world. Trump read nothing & did nothing to prepare USA for this virus
